STUB_BLURB_FIRST1.string: Tracker protection and ad-free private search, all under one roof

STUB_BLURB_SECOND1.string: Tracker protection and ad-free private search, all under one roof

STUB_BLURB_THIRD1.string: Tracker protection and ad-free private search, all under one roof

community-2.string: { -brand-short-name } is designed by <label data-l10n-name="community-mozillaLink">{ -vendor-short-name }</label>, based on code from Mozilla Firefox.

helpus.string: Want to help? Check out our code on <label data-l10n-name="helpus-getInvolvedLink">Github!</label>

search-engine-default-private-desc-2.string: Choose a different default search engine for Stealth Mode only

label.string: Use this search engine in Stealth Mode

search-show-suggestions-private-windows.string: Show search suggestions in Stealth Mode

history-dontremember-description.string: { -brand-short-name } will use the same settings in Stealth Mode, and will not remember any history as you browse the Web.

sitedata-delete-on-close-private-browsin.string: In permanent Stealth Mode, cookies and site data will always be cleared when { -brand-short-name } is closed.

httpsonly-radio-enabled-pbm.string: Enable HTTPS-Only Mode in Stealth Mode only

identity-custom-root.string: Connection verified by a certificate issuer that is not recognized by { -brand-short-name }.

identity-description-custom-root.string: { -brand-short-name } does not recognize this certificate issuer. It may have been added from your operating system or by an administrator. <label data-l10n-name="link">Learn More</label>

label.string: Set as Default Search Engine for Stealth Mode

about-logins-login-intro-heading-logged-.string: Looking for your saved logins? You can import them.

about-logins-intro-import.string: If your logins are saved in another browser, you can import them

about-private-browsing-info-description-.string: Stealth Mode: { -brand-short-name } clears your search and browsing history when you close all private windows. This doesn’t make you anonymous.

about-private-browsing-info-title.string: You’re Now Veiled in Stealth Mode

about-private-browsing-info-myths.string: Note that Stealth mode does not make you anonymous to websites, your internet service provider, and other third parties. Learn More

about-private-browsing-not-private.string: You are currently not in a Stealth Mode window.

about-private-browsing-search-banner-tit.string: { $engineName } is your default search engine in Stealth Mode

about-private-browsing-info-description.string: In Umbra’s private browsing mode, your activity will be kept confidential from others who use this device. The following will be automatically erased from Umbra Private Browser at the end of this session: Browsing historySearch historyCookiesDownload historyHowever, files you download will be retained by your device and pages you bookmark will be saved.

main-context-menu-open-link-new-private-.string: Open Link in New Stealth Mode Window

places-open-private-window.string: Open in a New Stealth Mode Window

privatebrowsing-button.tooltiptext.string: Open a new Stealth Mode window (%S)

detail-private-disallowed-label.string: Not Allowed in Stealth Mode Windows

detail-private-disallowed-description2.string: This extension does not run while in Stealth Mode. Learn more

detail-private-required-label.string: Requires Access to Stealth Mode Windows

detail-private-required-description2.string: This extension has access to your online activities while in Stealth Mode. Learn more

private-browsing-description2.string:
{ -brand-short-name } is changing how extensions work in Stealth Mode. Any new extensions you add to
{ -brand-short-name } won’t run by default in Stealth Mode Windows. Unless you allow it in settings, the
extension won’t work while in Stealth Mode, and won’t have access to your online activities
there. We’ve made this change to keep your Stealth Mode browsing private.
<label data-l10n-name="private-browsing-learn-more">Learn how to manage extension settings</label>

addon-detail-private-browsing-help.string: When allowed, the extension will have access to your online activities while in Stealth Mode. Learn more

contextMenuPrivateSearchOtherEngine.string: Search with %S in a Stealth Mode

appmenu-update-restart-message.string: After a quick restart, { -brand-shorter-name } will restore all your open tabs and windows that are not in Stealth Mode.

label.string: Allow this extension to run in Stealth Mode

newtab-menu-open-new-private-window.string: Open in a New Stealth Mode Window

leavePrivateBrowsingWindowsCancelDownloa.string: If you close all Stealth Mode windows now, 1 download will be canceled. Are you sure you want to leave Stealth Mode?
If you close all Stealth Mode windows now, %S downloads will be canceled. Are you sure you want to leave Stealth Mode?

ServiceWorkerRegisterStorageError.string: Failed to register/update a ServiceWorker for scope ‘%S’: Storage access is restricted in this context due to user settings or Stealth Mode.

ServiceWorkerGetRegistrationStorageError.string: Failed to get service worker registration(s): Storage access is restricted in this context due to user settings or Stealth Mode.

ServiceWorkerGetClientStorageError.string: Failed to get service worker’s client(s): Storage access is restricted in this context due to user settings or Stealth Mode.

ServiceWorkerPostMessageStorageError.string: The ServiceWorker for scope ‘%S’ failed to execute ‘postMessage‘ because storage access is restricted in this context due to user settings or Stealth Mode.

RegisterProtocolHandlerPrivateBrowsingWa.string: Can’t use registerProtocolHandler inside Stealth Mode.

taskbar.tasks.newPrivateWindow.descripti.string: Open a new window in Stealth Mode.
